<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="u_imp_saml_user_05o6wwiogg">3f60195d97e7a1106afa3ab71153af61</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[ //Send data to usage analytics.
 //sso_source is 'sso:' followed by the idp sys id. Hence 'sso:' needs to be removed
if (action == 'insert')
    SNC.SecurityEventSender.sendSAMLAutoprovisionGCFEvent('create');
else if (action == 'update' && target.changes())
    SNC.SecurityEventSender.sendSAMLAutoprovisionGCFEvent('update');
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sascha.wawerzinek@isdfeniqs.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-06-19 14:48:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>3360195d97e7a1106afa3ab71153af79</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onAfter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="LSS Core" source="x_isdfe_lss_core">900038c497a329106afa3ab71153af84</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="LSS Core">900038c497a329106afa3ab71153af84</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_3360195d97e7a1106afa3ab71153af79</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sascha.wawerzinek@isdfeniqs.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-06-19 14:48:58</sys_updated_on><when>onAfter</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
